#include <iostream>
#include <set>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <map>
using namespace std;
map<string, long long int>m;

void solve()
{
	string str;
	cin >> str;
	int l = str.size();
	for (int i = 0; i < l; i++) {
		if (str[i] == 'L') {
			if (m.find("LO") != m.end()) {
				m["LOL"] += m["LO"];
			}
			m["L"]++;
		}
		else if (str[i] == 'O') {
			if (m.find("L") != m.end()) {
				m["LO"] += m["L"];
			}
		}
	}
	cout << m["LOL"] << endl;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		m.clear();
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
